markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 9+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Noxious Incense](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1008)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Catalyst" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=396" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 169 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="" /><row>Cast a Spell</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Sold only in single sticks, this foul incense comes coated with a bevy of alchemical smoke that activates in the presence of intense heat, releasing its namesake pungent odor. Adding this catalyst to a [_wall of fire_](/Spells.aspx?ID=362) spell fills all squares adjacent to the wall with thick, foul smoke. Creatures in this area are [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4), and other creatures are concealed to creatures in the area. The smoke lasts for the duration of the spell.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 9"
pfs="Standard"
>
Noxious Incense
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 169 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 125 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Hands** 1

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The incense can be used with a _wall of fire_ of 6th level or below.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 14"
pfs="Standard"
>
Noxious Incense (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 169 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 750 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Hands** 2

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The incense can be used with a _wall of fire_ of any spell level.
name: Noxious Incense
